sen.j: 蘇我石川宿禰（そがの いしかわの すくね）は、蘇我石川（そがの いしかわ）とも呼ばれる日本神話の人物で、蘇我氏の祖とされる。
sen.e: Soga no ishikawa no sukune, was a Japanese mythological figure, also called Soga no ishikawa, and he was said to be the ancestor of the Soga clan
Soga no ishikawa no sukune, was a Japanese mythological figure, also called Soga no ishikawa, and he was said to be the ancestor of the Soga clan
Soga no ishikawa no sukune, was a Japanese mythological figure, also called Soga no ishikawa, and he was said to be the ancestor of the Soga clan

sen.j: 河内国石川郡 (大阪府)で生まれた。
sen.e: He was born in 河内国石川郡 (大阪府)Ishikawa Country, Kawachi Province (Osaka Prefecture).
He was born in Ishikawa County, Kawachi Province (Osaka Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 漢字部分を除去、countryをcounty（郡）に変更。
sen.e: He was born in Ishikawa County, Kawachi Province (Osaka Prefecture).

sen.j: 武内宿禰の子であり、蘇我満智の父である。
sen.e: He was the son of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune, and the father of Soga no machi.
sen.cmt: 統一用語リストに従うと、武内宿禰→TAKENOUCHI no Sukune、蘇我満智→Soga no machiと同じ文章の中に異なった名前表記(TAKENOUCHI no Sukune)があります。
sen.e: He was a son of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune, and the father of Soga no machi.
sen.cmt: sonの冠詞をthe からaに変更
sen.e: He was a son of TAKENOUCHI no Sukune, and the father of Soga no machi.

sen.j: 名前から見て、蘇我倉山田石川麻呂もしくはその子孫が創作した架空の人物であるとする説もある。
sen.e: Also there is a theory that judging from the name, this figure was an imaginary person created by SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro or some of his descendents.
sen.cmt: 蘇我倉山田石川麻呂→SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaroと統一表記リストに従いました。
sen.e: Also there is a theory that judging from the name, this figure was an imaginary person created by SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro or some of his descendents.
Also there is a theory that judging from the name, this figure was an imaginary person created by SOGANOKURA-YAMADA no Ishikawamaro or some of his descendents.
